content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":143241,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Where is this...\""},{"lineNumber":143242,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信がテント内に設置された","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin woke up on a bed set up inside a tent."},{"lineNumber":143243,"originalJapaneseLine":"ベッドの上で目を覚ました。","translatedEnglishLine":"(Continuation from previous line; Kenshin woke up on a bed set up inside a tent.)"},{"lineNumber":143244,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おはよう謙信」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good morning, Kenshin.\""},{"lineNumber":143245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっ……愛……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm... Ai...\""},{"lineNumber":143246,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はどうして……あれから一体……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why am I... What happened after that...?"},{"lineNumber":143247,"originalJapaneseLine":"　確か、ランス殿に救われて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Surely, Lord Lance saved me...\""},{"lineNumber":143248,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、そうです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that's right."},{"lineNumber":143249,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの人の援護もあって、","translatedEnglishLine":"With his support,"},{"lineNumber":143250,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達はかろうじて脱出しました」","translatedEnglishLine":"we barely managed to escape.\""},{"lineNumber":143251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see..."},{"lineNumber":143252,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後で礼を言わねば」","translatedEnglishLine":"I must thank him later.\""},{"lineNumber":143253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「村の人々は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What about the villagers...?\""},{"lineNumber":143254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「数十人は救うことが出来ました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We were able to save several dozen people."},{"lineNumber":143255,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ、村人の大多数は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the majority of the villagers...\""},{"lineNumber":143256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":143257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……特別焼却師団は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What about the Special Incineration Corps?\""},{"lineNumber":143258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まだ近くにいますよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They are still nearby..."},{"lineNumber":143259,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は小高い山の上に陣を置いてます」","translatedEnglishLine":"They have set up camp on a low hill now.\""},{"lineNumber":143260,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら、すぐにでも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, right away...\""},{"lineNumber":143261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、我が軍の消耗は激しく","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, our forces are heavily drained,"},{"lineNumber":143262,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とても戦える状態ではありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"and we are not in a condition to fight.\""},{"lineNumber":143263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「特に謙信様の疲労は――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Especially Lord Kenshin's exhaustion—\""},{"lineNumber":143264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私なら大丈夫だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am fine.\""},{"lineNumber":143265,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信がベッドから降りる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin got off the bed."},{"lineNumber":143266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謙信、ちょっと、まさか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kenshin, wait, you don't mean...\""},{"lineNumber":143267,"originalJapaneseLine":"「他の者が動けないなら丁度いい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If others can't move, then it's perfect.\""},{"lineNumber":143268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私一人で内部に忍び込み、将を討つ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will sneak inside alone and kill the general.\""},{"lineNumber":143269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No.\""},{"lineNumber":143270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方にもしものことがあってはいけない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You must not get hurt."},{"lineNumber":143271,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなこと、許可できない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I cannot allow such a thing.\""},{"lineNumber":143272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私にはまだやることがある」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I still have things I must do.\""},{"lineNumber":143273,"originalJapaneseLine":"「天下太平。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Peace throughout the land."},{"lineNumber":143274,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はそれを成す為に生まれた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was born to achieve that.\""},{"lineNumber":143275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だからまだ死ぬつもりはない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's why I have no intention of dying yet.\""},{"lineNumber":143276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでも……駄目」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even so... no.\""},{"lineNumber":143277,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私は今まで、謙信の願いもワガママも、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Until now, I've fulfilled Kenshin's wishes and selfish desires,"},{"lineNumber":143278,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大抵は叶えてきた。それが私の仕事だから」","translatedEnglishLine":"for the most part. That's my role.\""},{"lineNumber":143279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、今回は駄目」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But this time, no.\""},{"lineNumber":143280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今までとは相手が違う。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This opponent is different from before."},{"lineNumber":143281,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回は本当に死んでしまうかも知れない」","translatedEnglishLine":"This time, you might really die.\""},{"lineNumber":143282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……愛」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ai.\""},{"lineNumber":143283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ喧嘩か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's this, a fight?\""},{"lineNumber":143284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス殿……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Lance...\""},{"lineNumber":143285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謙信出撃するのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kenshin is heading out to battle."},{"lineNumber":143286,"originalJapaneseLine":"　止めないのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Aren't you going to stop him?\""},{"lineNumber":143287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言って止まるような子なら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If he were the kind of person who would stop just by being told to,"},{"lineNumber":143288,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいんですけどね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"that would be fine, but...\""},{"lineNumber":143289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが今の私の成すべきことなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If that's what I must do now,"},{"lineNumber":143290,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は行かないわけにはいかない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't not go.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信がテント内に設置された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin woke up on a bed set up inside a tent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドの上で目を覚ました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Continuation from previous line; Kenshin woke up on a bed set up inside a tent.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はどうして……あれから一体……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why am I... What happened after that...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確か、ランス殿に救われて……」
あの人の援護もあって、
私達はかろうじて脱出しました」
「数十人は救うことが出来ました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We were able to save several dozen people.
However, the majority of the villagers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は小高い山の上に陣を置いてます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have set up camp on a low hill now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、我が軍の消耗は激しく
とても戦える状態ではありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we are not in a condition to fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信がベッドから降りる。
「他の者が動けないなら丁度いい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If others can't move, then it's perfect."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私一人で内部に忍び込み、将を討つ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will sneak inside alone and kill the general."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方にもしものことがあってはいけない。
そんなこと、許可できない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I cannot allow such a thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……私にはまだやることがある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I still have things I must do."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はそれを成す為に生まれた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was born to achieve that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だからまだ死ぬつもりはない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why I have no intention of dying yet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……私は今まで、謙信の願いもワガママも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Until now, I've fulfilled Kenshin's wishes and selfish desires,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大抵は叶えてきた。それが私の仕事だから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for the most part. That's my role."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は本当に死んでしまうかも知れない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, you might really die."
Aren't you going to stop him?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言って止まるような子なら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If he were the kind of person who would stop just by being told to,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが今の私の成すべきことなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's what I must do now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は行かないわけにはいかない」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I cannot allow such a thing."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, you might really die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが今の私の成すべきことなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's what I must do now,
